Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@coingirl87 the name and encrypted pin are like username and password for the seed phrase, but it is stored only on your computer
this so that you don't need to paste seed everytime

Author: coingirl87#6489
Content: Ok thank you...but that is really safe to have an auto fill in?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
the encrypt pin is used to encrypt that seed phrase and store it on your computer
if you trust that computer to hold your wallet.dat, then this is similar

Content:
that was old instruction.
use https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0.13-PBaaS-Cross-chain-Technology-Preview
open KMD lite mode and create a new wallet
if you get server error etc., 
follow this guide: https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers/
